001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.service;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
005import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
006import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.R;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.Ranking;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Scheduler;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
010import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.concurrent.Executors;
013import javax.inject.Inject;
014import javax.inject.Singleton;
015
016@Singleton
017public class RankingsRepository {
018
019  private static final int THREAD_POOL_SIZE = 4;
020  private final CodebreakerServiceProxy serviceProxy;
021  private final GoogleSignInService signInService;
022  private final Scheduler scheduler;
023  private final int poolSize;
024
025  @Inject
026  RankingsRepository(@ApplicationContext Context context, CodebreakerServiceProxy serviceProxy, GoogleSignInService signInService) {
027    this.serviceProxy = serviceProxy;
028    this.signInService = signInService;
029    scheduler = Schedulers.from(Executors.newFixedThreadPool(THREAD_POOL_SIZE));
030    poolSize = context.getResources().getStringArray(R.array.color_names).length;
031  }
032
033  public Single<List<Ranking>> getRankings(int codeLength, int gamesThreshold){
034    return signInService
035        .refreshBearerToken()
036        .observeOn(scheduler)
037        .flatMap((token)-> serviceProxy.getRankings(poolSize, codeLength, gamesThreshold, token));
038  }
039
040
041}
